title: Alt + TAB Freezing the game after Worlds Update
body:
First, I am using windows 10.

Ever since the recent worlds patch within this last week or so, my computer has been experiencing freezing which forces me to hard shut down my computer. I even got reported for this. I tried past fixes like setting comp[atability to windows 7 and getting rid of xbox game bar. It is still giving me problems. Any advice?

replies.body:
Hmmmmm, you already mentioned it but I know that Game DVR messes League up a lot so double check for that juuuuust in case. Most Windows updates turn it back on.

If that doesn't help, run through our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some quick basic troubleshooting steps. Also be sure to double check for any possible missed graphics driver updates, but let me know if nothing seems to be helping so far and our techies can dig a little deeper with you.
